creator: ps@nomensa.com
text:
The image drawer currently shows documents that have been uploaded to a page and
not just images (i.e. PDF's, etc). This produces strange behaviour when a
non-image asset is inserted into the document.

this needs to be fixed in kupu

kupu/apache-lenya/lenya/pageassets2kupulibrary.xsl

needs to check for file extensions
creator: gregor@apache.org

text:
ok, i just fixed this in the kupu 1.2 branch. should make it to the kupu 1.2
release.
creator: gregor@apache.org
